Description: This web service retrieves high-level problem list data and health status data from a patient's chart for problems with a class of “Health Concern,” which indicates that the problem is of special concern. Like the Condition (Health Concern) web service, this web service evaluates problem list (LPL) records, but it returns only a brief overview of key information about those records, such as whether they are active and when they were resolved. If you need to return more detailed information, use the Condition (Health Concern) web service instead.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Reference to a Patient resource the Flag is for.
patient.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must match.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the condition: active, inactive, or entered in error.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Reference to a Patient resource the Flag is for.
subject.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must match.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry in the resource bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

Flag.Name: Flag
Flag.Description: A single instance of a Flag resource.

category.Name: category
category.Description: The Epic category ID for the condition, labeled “health-concern,” and the LOINC code for the condition, labeled “condition.”

code.Name: code
code.Description: The diagnosis code for the condition.

flag-detail.Name: extension
flag-detail.Description: A reference to the Condition (Health Concern) resource.

profile.Name: profile
profile.Description: Available in Netherlands environments only. This environment shows that this API conforms to the profile connected to the following canonical url: http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-Alert

period.Name: period
period.Description: The period during which the condition was marked as active.

end.Name: end
end.Description: Date when the condition was marked as resolved.

start.Name: start
start.Description: Date when the condition was added.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the condition: active, inactive, or entered in error.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: A reference to the Patient resource.
